original_text: The twelfth, for the twelfth month, was Heldai the Netophathite, from the family of Othniel. There were 24,000 men in his division.
korean_text: 열두째 달 열두째 지휘관은 옷니엘 자손에 속한 느도바 사람 헬대니 그 반에 이만 사천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: The twelfth, for the twelfth month, was Heldai the Netophathite
sentences.korean_translation: 열두째, 열두째 달을 담당한 사람은 네도바 사람 헬대였습니다

sentences.original_text: There were 24,000 men in his division
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부대에는 이만 사천 명의 병사가 있었습니다
